text: The Akassa tribe (Akasa, Akaha) of the Ijaw people lives along the Nun River estuary and the Atlantic coast of southern Bayelsa State, Nigeria. Akassa settlements include: Opu-Akassa, Sangana, and Kamatoru.Alagoa, Ebiegberi Joe (2005).
